entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4 except zero near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4 except zero near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:50 AM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023
